message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. I think it would be a great fit for you. Given its value, I'm offering it at $22,000. What do you think?
I'm very interested in the product, but $22,000 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. Would you be willing to consider that?
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While $22,000 represents its true value, I'm willing to come down to $18,000. This is my final offer.
I'm still a bit far from $18,000. I was thinking more along the lines of $14,000. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?
